data.sentence: The word أَنْ comes from the root ا ن and is associated with the meanings:

data.meanings: to be or become sociable, companionable, conversable, inclined to company or conversation, friendly, amicable, or familiar. To be or become cheered, or gladdened or cheerful, gay, or gladsome. To be or become at ease, or tranquil; without shrinking or aversion.
data.sentence: The word الْإِنْسَانُ comes from the root ا ن س and is associated with the meanings: to be or become sociable, companionable, conversable, inclined to company or conversation, friendly, amicable, or familiar. To be or become cheered, or gladdened or cheerful, gay, or gladsome. To be or become at ease, or tranquil; without shrinking or aversion.

data.meanings: To think, consider, suppose, imagine, be of opinion.
data.sentence: The word أَيَحْسَبُ comes from the root ح س ب and is associated with the meanings: To think, consider, suppose, imagine, be of opinion.

data.meanings: To leave off, leave alone, abandon/desert/relinquish/quit, forsake, give up anything, neglect, omit, bequeath anything to anyone.
data.sentence: The word يُتْرَكَ comes from the root ت ر ك and is associated with the meanings: To leave off, leave alone, abandon/desert/relinquish/quit, forsake, give up anything, neglect, omit, bequeath anything to anyone.
The word سُدًى comes from the root س د ي and is associated with the meanings: at will , in vain.
